title: [GAMEPLAY] EKKO - Q return
body:
I noticed since the last patch that there is a bug on Ekko's Q on the return hit. Since i play jungle this is a bit of a disadvantage, but since I can't record a video, it would be helpful if others could test/confirm this problem.

BUG example:

Q on Blue, goes through monsters and applies damage, on the return path (i don't move anywhere, so we are all on the same position) the Q returns, goes through the monsters and does no damage and no hit-on effects.

replies.body:
Hey Mn3mic! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it! ^-^
Great - hope the issue will be resolved soon :)
